rev.desc.rev.desc: On panel msg, convert $L.text to a string to prevent blank or garbled active notes.
Removed ck.for.msg panel. Will send out a msg if no msgtype exists.
Added a msg panel for "msg" msgtype messages.
Externalized message text query. If the message number is null, then the message name is passed in to the mail and email applications as a subject line.
Corrected Typo in Query on panel get.msg.text.1. Missing Dollar sign on the $L.no variable.
Set up parameters for new message types noticenter and noticenterappr.
Corrected parameter settings for fax and page.
Added sort to msgclass select of type and class.name so that the msgclasses are processed in the correct order.
Deleted settings for $L.class="msg"; no need for message.msg, message type is handled by message.
Defaulted $L.parms to {"text", "name"} and $L.values to {$L.text, $L.users} on set.appl.parms. That way, users can add their own message routines without having to edit this application.
Modified set.appl.parms to support fax and page message types.
Changed msgtype search query to type=nullsub(type in $L.msgclass, $L.class) on select.msg.type.
Rewrote application so that the msgtype file is used in determining which RAD subroutine to call when processing a particular message type. Removed format parameter.
Now uses a generated counter rather than a getnumb call as a record.id
Added logic so that change management msg class messages were sent properly

descript.descript: On panel msg, convert $L.text to a string to prevent blank or garbled active notes.
Removed ck.for.msg panel. Will send out a msg if no msgtype exists.
Added a msg panel for "msg" msgtype messages.
Externalized message text query. If the message number is null, then the message name is passed in to the mail and email applications as a subject line.
Corrected Typo in Query on panel get.msg.text.1. Missing Dollar sign on the $L.no variable.
Set up parameters for new message types noticenter and noticenterappr.
Corrected parameter settings for fax and page.
Added sort to msgclass select of type and class.name so that the msgclasses are processed in the correct order.
Deleted settings for $L.class="msg"; no need for message.msg, message type is handled by message.
Defaulted $L.parms to {"text", "name"} and $L.values to {$L.text, $L.users} on set.appl.parms. That way, users can add their own message routines without having to edit this application.
Modified set.appl.parms to support fax and page message types.
Changed msgtype search query to type=nullsub(type in $L.msgclass, $L.class) on select.msg.type.
Rewrote application so that the msgtype file is used in determining which RAD subroutine to call when processing a particular message type. Removed format parameter.
Now uses a generated counter rather than a getnumb call as a record.id
Added logic so that change management msg class messages were sent properly
